title: Was Brady's Explanation Good Enough?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth, and Bill Barnwell debate what to make of several NFL owners wanting Goodell to suspend Deshaun for less than a year, if they’re okay with Brady’s explanation of his absence, how embarrassed Nebraska should be after their Week 0 loss, the chances that Bloopy did a good job running the ball against youth football players and what will happen if tonight is Serena’s final singles match. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (Debatable): Several NFL owners allegedly wanted a shorter suspension for Deshaun Watson and how embarrassed should Nebraska be after their loss?
